alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 9:57AM MST until January 23 at 1:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Northern Perkins County, Ziebach County, Haakon County and Southern Perkins County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists may encounter areas of frosty and slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach
